V: 6-7/10
A: 6

The main issue is that in wide-shots the 3D is clearly present (double-image, blurry).  I'd say about 3/8 to 1/2 of the film is in that 3D annoying format.  It's not too distracting though.  At least for me.

As the description says they tried their best.  And for their efforts they did a descent job with what they had.

Overall, it's worth the dload.  I fully expect this film itself to suck (blood, that is) >:E
